title: Mathematics Educational Material Development Using Open Educational Resources (OER) Remix

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of Open Educational Resources (OER) and foundational knowledge in mathematics education
context.additional_context: Students learn without time/location constraints using personal mobile devices, with a focus on resolving licensing/copyright issues arising during remixing processes

learning_goals: Develop at least three remixed resources aligned with specific learning objectives using math materials from OER platforms.
Explain appropriate attribution and application methods for CC license types with 90% accuracy.
Design a process for integrating OER math content from diverse sources according to technical standards (e.g., PDF/HTML compatibility).

resources: OER sample database for math education

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
